remark.p: Deputy Director, Office of Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development, European Community and Atlantic Political-Economic Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State, until 1977; Executive Assistant to Deputy Secretary of State Christopher from 1977 until 1978; thereafter Deputy Chief of Mission, U.S. Mission to the European Communities at Brussels, from 1978
Foreign Service Officer. Representative of the U.S.A. to the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (Paris).
